items.translated_title: Apple’s Siri revamp reportedly delayed… again
items.content: While the new Siri was expected to launch with the upcoming iOS 26.4 update in March, now, the changes are expected to roll out more slowly over time, reportedly postponing some features until the May iOS update, or even until the release of iOS 27 in September.

items.title: Who will own your company’s AI layer? Glean’s CEO explains
items.creator: Theresa Loconsolo

items.translated_title: Who will own your company’s AI layer? Glean’s CEO explains
items.content: Enterprise AI is shifting fast from chatbots that answer questions to systems that actually do the work across an organization. But who will own the AI layer that powers all of it?  Glean, which started as an enterprise search product, has evolved into what it calls an “AI work assistant,” aiming to sit underneath other AI […]

items.translated_title: Senior engineers, including co-founders, exit xAI amid controversy
